PageTitle: display bgp vpnv6 routing-table dampening parameter
FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv6 routing-table dampening parameter command displays configured BGP VPNv6 route dampening parameters.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv6 vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> routing-table dampening parameter

ParaDef.Info:
Specify a VPN-Instance (VRF) name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv6 vpn-instance VPN1 routing-table dampening parameter
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpnv6 routing-table dampening parameter command displays configured BGP VPNv6 route dampening parameters.
